014package org.jdbi.v3.core.argument;
015
016import java.util.Collection;
017import java.util.Collections;
018import java.util.Optional;
019
020import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
021import org.jdbi.v3.meta.Beta;
022
023/**
024 * Returns an Argument based on a name. Used to lookup multiple properties e.g. in a Bean or a Map.
025 */
026@FunctionalInterface
027public interface NamedArgumentFinder {
028    Optional<Argument> find(String name, StatementContext ctx);
029
030    /**
031     * Returns the names this named argument finder can find. Returns an empty collection otherwise.
032     *
033     * @return the names this named argument finder can find. Returns an empty collection otherwise.
034     */
035    @Beta
036    default Collection<String> getNames() {
037        return Collections.emptySet();
038    }
039}
